The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#22167](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22167) (refactor: Remove char serialize by MarcoFalke)

If you consider
There is a safe helper `CharCast` and `UCharCast`, that can be used.\n\nThough, I have a patch (Bundle 2/2 of #21969) to remove `char` completely.
